origin.origins.ability.name: Too Many Zombies: Ability
origin.tmz.tmz.name: Too Many Zombies
origin.tmz.tmz.description: Be it a Zombie, Husk, Drowned or Zombified Piglin. You will find your rotten dreams in here.
origin.toomanyzombies.zombie.name: Zombie
origin.toomanyzombies.zombie.description: You are the Zombie of the Caves, You are the Zombie!
power.toomanyzombies.zombie/spawn.name: Spawn
power.toomanyzombies.zombie/spawn.descri: You will spawn in the Caves.
origin.toomanyzombies.husk.name: Husk
origin.toomanyzombies.husk.description: You are the Zombie of the Desert, You are the Husk!
power.toomanyzombies.husk/spawn.name: Spawn
power.toomanyzombies.husk/spawn.descript: You will spawn in the Desert.
origin.toomanyzombies.drowned.name: Drowned
origin.toomanyzombies.drowned.descriptio: You are the Zombie of the Ocean, You are the Drowned!
power.toomanyzombies.drowned/spawn.name: Spawn
power.toomanyzombies.drowned/spawn.descr: You will spawn in the Ocean.
origin.toomanyzombies.zombified_piglin.d: You are the Zombie of the Nether, You are the Zombified Piglin!
power.toomanyzombies.zombified_piglin/sp: You will spawn in the Nether.
power.toomanyzombies.common/ability.name: Natural Ability
power.toomanyzombies.common/ability.desc: You will choose your natural ability.
power.toomanyzombies.common/inability.de: You lose access to all of your abilities when you take damage, for 2 seconds.
power.toomanyzombies.common/upgrading.de: Once you absorb the Enchanted Rotten Flesh, You will become stronger.
origin.toomanyzombies-age.baby.name: Baby
origin.toomanyzombies-age.baby.descripti: You are a small and sneaky little rascal.
origin.toomanyzombies-age.adult.name: Adult
origin.toomanyzombies-age.adult.descript: You are a slow and decaying old soul.
power.toomanyzombies-age.baby/size.name: Size and Agility
power.toomanyzombies-age.baby/size.descr: Whilst you are half the size of a human, you are faster than them on land.
When you get hit, you lose your abilities for a short time.
power.toomanyzombies-age.adult/size.name: Size and Agility
power.toomanyzombies-age.adult/size.desc: Your decaying body whilst the same size as a human, slows you down drastically.
power.toomanyzombies-age.adult/inability: When you get hit, you lose your abilities for a short time.
origin.toomanyzombies-ability.none.name: None
origin.toomanyzombies-ability.none.descr: You do not have any extra abilities.
Ouch! That's hot! - Well not anymore. (Useless for Husk and Zombified Piglin Origins)
origin.toomanyzombies-ability.interdimen: Is that a wormhole in your pocket?
origin.toomanyzombies-ability.protection: You have a higher immunity than most zombies.
Your legs are stronger than most zombies.
power.toomanyzombies-ability.interdiment: You always have access to an Ender Chest.
power.toomanyzombies-ability.handyman/cr: You always have access to a Crafting Table.
power.toomanyzombies-ability.brawniness/: You always have a strength boost.
You always have a resistance boost.
power.toomanyzombies-ability.swiftness/s: You always have a speed boost.
